CAREER SUMMARY
Aug 2021 to date enercity Erneuerbare GmbH
Position: Head of Legal, Insurance and Compliance
Large nationwide wind onshore and open space photovoltaic plant developer.
Advising senior management, project development and operations departments, drafting, negotiating and remedying complex (project and land use) contracts, legal due diligence of wind parks to be acquired, restructuring special purpose vehicles, supervising the dealing with company house and land register matters; managing legal advisors.
Aug 2018 to Dec 2020 Urenco Limited
Position: Director of Government Affairs Germany and Legal Counsel
World’s second largest (multi-national) uranium enricher with plants in the U.S., Germany, the Netherlands and the U.K.
Highly rated representation and management of political and legal company interests, inter alia by protecting its site from closure by federal legislation, lobbying politicians and being the interface to federal and state administration (also in the area of mobile hydrogen storage technology)
Trustfully advising CEO, General Counsel and German site; successfully managing group project on export management and participating in planning public affairs engagement
Actively representing company interests in nuclear industry association KernD
Selected by German CEO Dr Thomas Haeberle (former member of executive board of Evonik); member of team of five headed by U.S. American Melissa Mann with other members from the U.S., the U.K. and the Netherlands
Nov 2014 to Jul 2018 GETEC net AG
Position: Head of Regulatory Affiars
Nationwide operator of industrial site and local / quarter electricity networks.
Highly rated negotiations as authorised representative and interface to energy sector regulators
Successfully establishing and implementing regulatory compliance management and controlling in close cooperation with CEO and finance and software engineering departments; managing legal and economic advisors
Successfully managing special projects such as developing a regulatory business case of connecting the electricity grid of a Dutch sea port to the German transmission network and bidding for a municipal licence to build and operate energy distribution networks
Oct 2011 to Jun 2014 Gasunie Deutschland Services
Position: Head of Legal and Project Manager Investment Controlling
German part of Dutch-German gas transmission system operator
Closely collaborating with regulatory affairs and business development departments and participating in negotiations with the regulatory agency and in the commercial evaluation of regulatory issues; managing legal advisors and budget of 450,000 EUR
Successfully completing or participating in major projects, also within multi-national teams, and negotiating complex contracts such as share deal and operations agreements for the Northern European natural gas pipeline, bidding for the largest German gas transmission operator and hydrogen (power to gas) transportation
Successfully implementing compliance management and its processes
Actively representing company interests in and managing team’s participation in variouscommittees of federal industry association BDEW

Position: Expert Special Projects in Regulatory Affairs
Third largest German vertically integrated energy company
Highly rated advice inter alia of electricity and gas transmissions and distribution system operators on regulatory compliance and legal matters including European Union’s Third Energy Package
Successfully performing all responsibilities of group unbundling compliance officer (including coordination of regulatory affairs officers of subsidiaries)
Actively managing or coordinating special projects such as evaluating and negotiating strategic partnership for electricity transmissions system operator and in the area of regulatory unbundling
Aligning, coordinating and drafting group responses to consultations of European institutions on energy market design and network regulation

Institute for Mining & Energy Law at Ruhr-Universität Bochum, Germany

accomplishing academic publications and holding conference presentations

Successfully managing and participating in corporate transactions and restructurings
Highly rated management of German desk
COMMENT
Dual qualified German-English lawyer with 17 years energy industry experience in Germany, the UK
and the Netherlands inter alia advising international energy companies inhouse in regulatory and
government affairs. Additionally, five years’ experience in private practice in Germany and the UK with a Ph.D. in Law and Economics in European energy network regulation:
Comprehensive knowledge of and experience in the key issues of energy transition and in-depth expertise in the functioning of the electricity and gas markets, their design and regulation
Highly rated representation of stakeholder and company interests and interface in communications with regulatory agencies and state administration and experience in working with industry associations and in the area of political and corporate communications and lobbying
Successfully and reliably negotiating with regulatory agencies and monitoring, evaluating and communicating political and regulatory developments and their legislative implementation
Active networking and political engagement in various capacities in industry associations, business communities and the German Conservative Party; member of influential lobbying platforms in Berlin (such as the Forum for Future Energies)
Successfully managing special projects with multi-national and multi-disciplinary teams; strong background and experience in business administration
Trustfully advising executive and senior management and collaborating with business development and finance departments; successfully managing, reorganising and establishing legal and regulatory affairs teams
Appreciated as a person of integrity with persuasiveness, focus and quick comprehension, able to work independently and manage several threads and projects in parallel, responsible and diligent, team-minded, conciliatory and loyal
